title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4242.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4242.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

The following terms shall have the meanings set forth below
for purposes of this Part: (a) Eligible
business shall mean any of those businesses set forth in section
4242.3
of this Part as eligible
for program assistance. (b) Eligible
project or eligible expansion or attraction project shall mean a project that
meets the requirements of section
4242.3
(a) and is
not ineligible under section
4242.3
(b) of this

Part. (c) New, permanent, full-time, private sector job shall mean a job meeting the requirements of section
4242.3
of this Part. (d) Retail shall have the meaning set forth
in section
4242.3
(b)(1)
of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4242.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
